title: Bug 2694Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Pressing 'Add' for the associated editors should enable multiple selection. Additionally, the default entry in the associated editors list should be marked as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:
f. The dialog should have a width hint.
g. The 'File editors' preference page grows in height when it is selected, but other pages do not.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) - Fixes for issues a, c, f have been released. Also fixed issue g.
SR:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)

To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the 'preference' page
2. Go to 'Workbench > File Editors'
3. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' list, navigate to the 'External Editors' section
4. Select an entry from the 'External Editors' list
5. Switch back to the 'Internal Editors' section, notice that there is still no selection
6. Press 'OK'

Expected Behavior:
After pressing 'OK', the selected external editor should be added to the 'Internal Editors' list as the default entry.
